short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Vivino Ratings for UK online wine shops (Majestic, Laithwaite's, Virgin Wines)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wondered if the wine you're about to buy is any good? Try this extension to get instant Vivino ratings as you're browsing wines on some of UK's most popular wine websites (Majestic, Laithwaite's, Virgin Wines)
